text: Join us on14 September 2024from10 AM to 1 PMat Škoda Centre Singapore.Dive into the exciting world of Škoda and discover our all-new 7-seater Škoda Kodiaq. Enjoy a morning filled with interactive discussions and exclusive one-day only free accessories package worth over $3 000 on the Škoda Kodiaq.Event highlights:🚗 In-depth introduction to Škoda Kodiaq✨ Interactive Q&A sessions with our experts💪 Exclusive promotions for event attendees📅 Save the date: 14 September🕒 Time: 10 AM - 1 PM📍 Location: Škoda Centre Singapore  26 Leng Kee Rd  Singapore 159104Register here:Event Registration Link
